meanings.definition: A person who shows favoritism to relatives, especially in hiring or promoting them.
meanings.sent1: The nepotists in the company always gave the best jobs to their family members.
meanings.sent2: The nepotists in the government appointed their cousins to top positions.
meanings.sent3: The nepotists at the family reunion made sure only their relatives got the biggest slices of cake.
meanings.sent4: The nepotists in the royal court treated their family like royalty, regardless of merit.
meanings.sent5: The nepotists' bias towards their kin was evident to everyone in the organization.

meanings.definition: Those who practice nepotism, favoring family members in business or politics.
meanings.sent1: The group of nepotists always put their family's interests above all else.
meanings.sent2: The nepotists in the business ensured their relatives got the best deals.
meanings.sent3: The nepotists' family gatherings were like exclusive clubs for their kin.
meanings.sent4: The nepotists' influence in the industry was like a family monopoly.
meanings.sent5: The nepotists' actions clearly showed their preference for family ties over fairness.
